duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop an in-depth understanding of Amazon Ads solutions and effectively communicate their value to clients.
Provide top-level sales and customer service to clients, ensuring retention and growth of revenue from existing advertisers.
Facilitate the closure of deals in a new business environment while maintaining a strong focus on client needs.
Develop annual media strategies based on advertiser goals, and drive campaign strategies and audience engagement recommendations.
Analyze campaign performance using data and deliver actionable recommendations for advertising strategy.
Educate clients on performance metrics and insights, guiding them to drive greater results.
Collaborate with internal and external teams to drive incremental revenue and increase advertiser satisfaction.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Economics, Marketing, Advertising, Statistics, Engineering, or Business (Master's preferred)
